title: Meeting place of council
context: PART I. GENERAL JURISDICTION AND POWERS Cross References Emergency preparedness, see §125C-32. Jurisdiction over real property taxation, see state constitution, article VIII, §3 and chapter 246A. §46-1 Meeting place of council. All meetings, regular or special, of the council may be held at such places within the county other than the county seat as the council shall designate. [L 1963, c 19, §1; Supp, §138-50; HRS §46-1] Cross References Emergency seat of government, see §§130-3, 130-4.
